definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: But that's what Microsoft said about Windows and IE.
sentences.chinese: 但微软也正是这样说视窗和IE的啊。

sentences.english: Each new version of Windows is a visible and significant milestone for the company.
sentences.chinese: 视窗的每一个新版本都是一个有目共睹的重要里程碑。

sentences.english: Microsoft, for instance, remains firmly attached to its Windows operating system (see article).
sentences.chinese: 比如微软就依然坚定不移地死守视窗操作系统。

sentences.english: Windows is for grandmas, like Macs used to be in the 90s.
sentences.chinese: 视窗，正如一九九零年代的苹果一样，只有祖母才用。

sentences.english: The pressed key is optionally displayed in the console window.
sentences.chinese: 按下的按键会显示在主控台视窗中。

sentences.english: You can post new messages from pop-up page after clicking the button.
sentences.chinese: 点击按钮后，你可以在弹出视窗直接发送新的讯息。

sentences.english: The editor displays two drop-down lists at the top of the window.
sentences.chinese: 编辑器会在视窗顶端显示两个下拉式清单。

sentences.english: Its second big money-spinner, the Office suite of applications, is tied to Windows.
sentences.chinese: 微软第二大赚钱的是应用办公套件，其依靠视窗系统。

sentences.english: You can set the cursor location in a source window.
sentences.chinese: 您可以在来源视窗内设定游标的位置。
视窗是流量控制的机制。

sentences.english: A single-head viewing window can be used for inspecting the dynamics of two dyed cloth areas which flow through pipelines.
sentences.chinese: 一单头视窗可检视两被染布区流经管道之动态。

sentences.english: Transforms position from viewport space into world space.
sentences.chinese: 从视窗空间到世界空间的变换位置。

sentences.english: You can split a text editor window into two panes.
sentences.chinese: 您可以将一个文字编辑器视窗分割成两个窗格。

sentences.english: Windows, and now Vista, is the central element that allows the digital lifestyle to thrive.
sentences.chinese: 视窗维斯卡是数字生活方式蓬勃发展的核心力量。

sentences.english: Windows is one of the franchise brands and products for Microsoft.
sentences.chinese: 视窗是微软的特许经营品牌和产品之一。

sentences.english: Lingoes is an excellent dictionary software in Microsoft Windows Platform.
sentences.chinese: 灵格斯是一个优秀的微软视窗平台字典软件。

definition: rectangular frame used to view a scene (made out of cardboard etc, or formed by the thumbs and forefingers)/viewfinder/viewing frame
